body: @azk___ Yes, her father died after he knew about Uta and Mi-kun, so Mi-kun though it was his fault that his brother died so his brain cut memory that his brother is already dead and still think his brother still alive.
Why can’t we ever have happiness in an ichihaya doujin ? Why does everything always have to have a depressing twist ?!?! His art is so good too ! It’s such a shame...

Ichihaya with his brain hacking again
